notes: echoed Base64 string is redirected and saved into a .dat file
decode the Base64-encoded .dat file back into a .vbs (VBScript) file

ioc: REG ADD HKCU SOFTWARE Microsoft Windows CurrentVersion Run /v Document /t REG_SZ /d %USERPROFILE% Links MXFhejJ3c3gzZWRjA vbs /f
notes: command ensures that the decoded VBScript runs every time the user logs in
